Welcome to CofTea!

Protecting your privacy is fundamental to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you sign up for our services.

Information We Collect
During the signup process, we may collect the following types of personal information:

 • Name: We ask for your name to personalize your experience with us.
 • Mobile Number: We collect your mobile number to communicate important updates, verify your account, and enable service-related notifications.
 • Location: For advance ordering purposes, we may request access to your location to provide location-based services and enhance your experience.

"How We Use Your Information
""We use the information collected during signup for the following purposes:

" • Account Creation: Your name and mobile number are used to create and manage your account with us.
 • Communications: We may use your mobile number to send you service-related notifications and updates.
 • Location-based Services: Access to your location allows us to provide personalized services such as advance ordering based on your current location.

"

"Information Security
We prioritize the security of your personal information. We implement various security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your data.

"

"Information Sharing
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy or as required by law.

"

"Consent
By signing up for our services, you consent to the collection, use, and processing of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy.

"

"Changes to Privacy Policy
We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes.

"
